entry: Philomathe
Obsession
Je te libère...
TODO:My mind is the nexus!
TODO:It bends my will... CONSUME ME!
TODO:I WILL HOLD ON NO LONGER.
TODO:The wordless must be spoken!
TODO:The terror flows forth.
TODO:Your thoughts are not your own.
TODO:These delusions finally bear fruit.
TODO:I must see it for myself.
TODO:Dismiss yourself!
TODO:I give myself to it!
TODO:It consumes my mind!
TODO:I submit to these thoughts.
TODO:You must see the truth.
TODO:I reveal this to you.
TODO:Through this, I find power.
L'esprit domine le corps.
TODO:It could not have been more obvious!
TODO:Bumbling troglodyte!
TODO:Clumsy oaf.
TODO:What do you think you're doing with that?!
TODO:Get away from that, you insect-brained plebian!
TODO:Inept savage! Back away before you destroy it!
TODO:This worthless form withstands.
TODO:This feeble body... It must have more!
TODO:Taint me not with your mortal touch.
TODO:Its power is sufficient.
TODO:No, NO! I must witness it!
TODO:Mend me not. Suffering draws me to the truth.
TODO:I'll be keeping this for further study.
TODO:These must be further analyzed.
TODO:Its secrets are mine and mine alone!
TODO:Step back, its knowledge would only confuse you.
TODO:I must know... I must.
TODO:Begone from me, I have studies to perform.
TODO:Is that beautiful reflection... Mine?
TODO:I'll need a means of paying my tuition when this is finished.
TODO:Treasures such as these must be catalogued.
TODO:I don't want to- Yet it forces me...
TODO:It consumes my mind, and my will...
TODO:I feel faint... So hungry...
Mon corps de décompose, aidez-moi !
Je ne sens plus mon corps...
Ils... ILS ARRIVENT !
J'ai... fait ça ?
TODO:It reels...!
Je... Je comprends maintenant !
TODO:Its weakness is clear!
Écrasé par un esprit supérieur.
Je vois...
TODO:I feel its power within me...
TODO:It empowers me... Why?
TODO:There is... Power in these whispers?
TODO:These sickening thoughts... Strengthen me?
TODO:Do you feel it creeping into your thoughts?
TODO:I feel its presence among us...
TODO:... Be quiet. Just be quiet already.
TODO:You all seem focused. Good.
TODO:It seems I am amongst sturdy minds.
TODO:You are admittedly quality company.
TODO:No medicines of mine can fix this mess.
TODO:I'm no surgeon, sadly.
TODO:Admittedly I know very little about treating others.
TODO:All our blood is in our bodies, so that is something to be thankful for.
TODO:Ready to carry on?.
TODO:I don't foresee myself falling today.
TODO:I'm not well, and nothing with me will null the pain.
TODO:I've come so far... So hard to push on...
TODO:In death... Would I still dream?
TODO:Not much to fear, is there?
TODO:Not a link of armor, and I'm doing just fine.
TODO:And to think they say I'm underdressed.
TODO:Not to get our hopes up, but things are going well.
TODO:Things could be much worse, I suppose.
TODO:Head is clear for now. I feel well.
TODO:I feel it speaking to me...
TODO:My mind... It's like an itch...
TODO:It is trying to overtake me...
TODO:Things could certainly be worse for us.
TODO:This is not a bad state we find ourselves in.
TODO:Perhaps I might even stay awake.
TODO:These forms are... Failing.
TODO:This form cannot press on...
TODO:Were we in over our heads?
TODO:Neither tinder nor timber...
TODO:No more fire... Should have worn more.
TODO:We'd best finish our dealings in this place soon.
TODO:Not much food left... Why didn't you bring more?
TODO:This form hu- I... I am hungry.
TODO:How can I stay awake on such an empty stomach?
TODO:You stocked us well. You have my gratitude.
TODO:If we eat like this too often, I may outgrow my clothes.
TODO:Full stomach, focused mind.
TODO:I didn't realize we had a logger amongst us.
TODO:No shortage of fuel for the flames.
TODO:You're not what I really had in mind as a team... But I'm grateful.
TODO:I was doubtful, but you all suffice.
TODO:Feeling a touch light-headed this high up...
TODO:My destination changes, yet my task is immutable.
TODO:Abhorrent mysteries await my prying eyes in this land.
TODO:A bit cramped in those dwellings...
TODO:I know my limits. Please don't make me!
TODO:I am a capable woman, but not that capable!
TODO:Surely someone else would be more qualified...?
TODO:I arrived here with the hope of surviving!
TODO:I've nothing left to learn from such a trifling task.
TODO:You think too little of me.
TODO:There's nothing left for me to study there.
TODO:I'll not garner anything from this trivial task.
TODO:How could I be so easily deceived?
TODO:Since when was I so gullible?
TODO:How could I be so easily deceived?
TODO:How intriguing.
TODO:Definitely worth investigation.
TODO:Simply excellent!
TODO:Such a waste of my time...
TODO:How dull.
TODO:Not a single grain of knowledge to find.
TODO:You seem tense. I will soften your thoughts.
TODO:Relax yourse- Nevermind, I will do it for you.
TODO:Cease your sniveling. This will repair you.
TODO:Tireless studies have taught me this technique.
TODO:You have room to improve... But Im sure you will.
TODO:You could be doing better. You have it in you.
TODO:Losing focus...
TODO:It is speaking.
TODO:Head hurts...
TODO:I must shoulder this burden...
TODO:*strained breathing*
TODO:...I hear it...
TODO:I am- This form, it- I...
TODO:Got to get a grip...
TODO:*shudders*
TODO:Can't... Breathe...
TODO:Need to... Hold it together...
TODO:I see the threshold...
TODO:I see the threshold...
TODO:The abyss opens to me...
TODO:The abyss opens to me...
TODO:It all goes dark...
TODO:It all goes dark...
TODO:I hear it speaking... Help me!
TODO:I hear it speaking... Help me!
TODO:No, please, I must see her again!
TODO:Stay with me, I have use of you!
TODO:Do not let it take you yet!
TODO:Do not shed your mortal coil this day.
TODO:Stand! You are still useful.
TODO:Carry on. You still have purpose.
TODO:You are well enough.
TODO:It will not take me. I refuse!
TODO:I will live on to see my mind repaired.
TODO:Not until this curse is broken!
TODO:These blackened thoughts are mounting...
TODO:My mind strains...
TODO:My head... Make it stop!
TODO:Augh! This headache...!
TODO:Carry on. This curse will not lift itself.
TODO:I have a mind to salvage. Move along.
TODO:This day will be long enough if we do not march.
TODO:You ingrates do not understand what it means to sleep.
TODO:Go on, rest. You have the luxury of it.
TODO:This form may not rest.
TODO:It must not be tampered with.
TODO:This form needs not of nourishment.
TODO:Impede this form no further!
TODO:My visions... Fulfilled...
TODO:My visions... Fulfilled...
TODO:My visions... Fulfilled...
TODO:My visions... Fulfilled...
TODO:If I could just see her one last time...
TODO:Should I be so lucky to meet a similar fate...
TODO:I envy her tranquility...
TODO:N-No, am I asleep?! It cannot be, THIS CANNOT BE REAL!
TODO:Now *you* warrant further study!
TODO:I could stay up all night watching this!
TODO:J-... Janet?
TODO:So beautiful...
TODO:So beautiful...
TODO:So beautiful...
TODO:So beautiful...
TODO:You... Love me?
TODO:You... Love me?
TODO:You... Love me?
TODO:You... Love me?
TODO:Was it... A dream?
TODO:I don't understand what came over me!
TODO:It's taking me- IT'S TAKING ME!
TODO:Get me out of these chains!
TODO:It is trying to take me, HELP!
TODO:The chains are crushing me!
TODO:Why can I hear its voices?
TODO:I corrupted myself so!
TODO:I'd rather it take me than burn here!
TODO:*desperate wailing*
TODO:Consume me, creature! Get me out of here!
TODO:*choking on smoke*
TODO:THE BLOOD SPEAKS LOUDER!
TODO:So thirsty...
TODO:This hunger... This power...
TODO:I feel faint... Need blood. Precious blood...
TODO:THE BLOOD SPEAKS INSTEAD!
TODO:THE POWER IN MY VEINS!
TODO:SO JOYOUS! IT TAKES CONTROL!
TODO:This drug-tainted blood must suffice!
TODO:It cannot stop me! I must drink!
TODO:I need it... That sweetest of medicines...
TODO:Not until my needs are sated!
TODO:My body must feel the pleasures of the blood!
TODO:Yet you deny me that precious red nectar?!
TODO:Here, it must be here!
TODO:More... More...
TODO:Surely there is blood hidden here, PLEASE!
TODO:So restless! So lurid!
TODO:So restless! So lurid!
TODO:So restless! So lurid!
TODO:I could stay awake forever!
TODO:I could stay awake forever!
TODO:I could stay awake forever!
TODO:My body feels so right!
TODO:My body feels so right!
TODO:My body feels so right!
TODO:If only she could feel this with me!
TODO:Am I asleep? How is any of this happening?!
TODO:Is there no end to them?
TODO:Need to catch my breath...
TODO:It appears calm here... Finally.
TODO:A forest? How are we...?
TODO:Wait, how did we get here from the farm?
TODO:This odor... I'd rather return to rotten crops!
TODO:How does one navigate this hell?!
TODO:This rubble... Have I treaded it before?
TODO:Endless sarcoghagi in endless catacombs...
TODO:These waters ebb and flow at the same time...
TODO:These caves are... Are impossible!
TODO:This soil... Familiar, yet alien.
TODO:Close to reality, yet still so distant...
TODO:His sorrow... Does he truly remember?
TODO:Is this man not entirely gone?
TODO:I am... Home...
TODO:These streets... They are not...
TODO:When did we return? Did we?

Psychanalyse
Surdosage
Ces pensées vous déconcentrent. Je les effacerai...
Laissez-moi m'occuper de la réflexion.
Ne vous laissez pas distraire par des pensées futiles.
N'importe quoi... S'il vous plaît, n'importe quoi pour m'aider...
L'un d'eux va bien finir par m'aider.
Juste une gorgée. Ou deux. Ou cinq...
Je ne me préoccupe plus des effets secondaires.
Ce n'est pas une solution, mais je n'ai pas mieux.
Un soulagement au goût infect...
Ils ne devraient pas réagir *trop* mal... J'espère.
Encyclopédie des horreurs Vol. I
Dictionnaire infernal 2nde édition
Carte abyssal : Tome 3
Journal des hallucinations (4/5)
"Le cinquième codex noir"

Manteau de l'apprenti
Veste d'universitaire

Uniforme d'érudit

Habits légers

TODO:Once a collegiate young woman, she now bears the invisible puppet strings of the otherwordly. Where others would have broken, her mind prevailed in standing against the forces she recklessly reached for. The horrors of beyond manifest within her, from which she may project great power, so long as she can pay the toll it demands.

TODO:The Philomath's mind draws power from books and tomes, exerting her will unto her victims. When these abilities will not suffice, a scalpel-sharp page-cutting knife remains in hand to dispatch overconfident aggressors.

TODO:A focused mind may achieve more than a tempered body. Exertion of her mental will can relieve or harm those around her, or she may rely on a personal supply of experimental and untested drugs and medicines.
Sororité
Échec scolaire
La Belle sans sommeil
Projet scientifique
Habillée pour briller
Projet scientifique
Il rampe dans mon esprit ! ÇA FAIT MAL !
Les chuchotements ne s'arrêtent pas ! Ils ne s'arrêtent PAS !
Cette chose viens pour moi !
Pflught'tith gahrlfr mnemnt'dhahl, arrive. Il arrive !
Allez-y... Prenez ce corps... Je vous l'offre.
Je pourrais m'évanouir. C'est trop risqué.
Avec les médicaments que je prends, l'alcool pourrait être fatal.
Je préfère rester lucide.
Je pourrais m'évanouir. C'est trop risqué.
Avec les médicaments que je prends, l'alcool pourrait être fatal.
Je préfère rester lucide.
TODO:If you have questions, I've... Dabbled, in self-medication.
TODO:I'm looking for a specific bottle...
TODO:May I see your catalogue? I have some preferred treatments.
TODO:What university did you graduate from? ...You haven't?
TODO:They must use the term "doctor" rather loosely around here.
TODO:I know a treatment you may find helpful...
TODO:I'm rather proficient in self-treatment.
TODO:Spare me the leeches, they offer no relief for this disease.
TODO:Hmph. So you're the best they have?
TODO:Allow me to administer that myself. I've used it often enough.
Connaissez-vous "le jeu du couteau" ?
Honnêtement, je ne suis pas une bonne menteuse.
Je ne perdrai pas mon temps avec des mises dérisoires.
Mais non, je ne compte pas les cartes.
Dix-huit ? Je me couche.
Je vous suggère de vous coucher, pour votre bien.
Je suis presque un poids plume.
Mesdames, fermez bien les yeux.
Vous vous sentez anxieux, n'est-ce pas ?
TODO:I've studied more styles than you've ever heard of.
TODO:Cease your whining, it doesn't hurt that much.
Arbitre, elle a tiré mes cheveux !
TODO:Stand aside and witness a true craftswoman at work.
Ces méthodes... Effroyablement dépassées et inefficaces.
TODO:Fret not, you could never hope to attain my talent.
Cette forme va coopérer, pour le moment.
TODO:I am on my break, leave me be.
TODO:Who milled this?! These granules are like molars!
TODO:Do none of you take pride in your work?
Je sais être... convaincante.
Je vous autorise à tenter de négocier.
Les prix sont négociables.
Votre talent de négociateur est à parfaire.
Ne m'insultez pas avec cette proposition.
Enfin, nous sommes d'accord.
Les cauchemars... disparaissent.
Enfin, une voix de moins dans ma tête.
Dans mes poumons, mes veines, ma gorge, tout est parfait.
TODO:My sweet Janet, I'll bring some home for you.
*Ronflement paisible*
TODO:Here, mix it with this tonic and see how it feels.
Empêchez-moi de dormir. EMPÊCHEZ-MOI DE DORMIR !
Plus de laudanum, MAINTENANT !
TODO:It peels back your false reality, now WITNESS IT!
TODO:This form is weakened, repair it!
TODO:It's nothing I haven't felt before.
TODO:I'm getting sleepy... Best keep your distance.
TODO:Not that one! Lest you share my dreams.
TODO:Yes, yes, I know it tastes like rotten meat.
TODO:Shackles? Stow them. I'm a student, not an animal.
TODO:Best to spread the balm out thinner.
TODO:That one is more effective when administered down here...
TODO:I'll apply that salve myself. I'd rather you not touch me there.
TODO:Did you even clean your hands?
TODO:What are you doing? Place that needle over a flame!
TODO:The answer is out there waiting for me!
TODO:I could not be more awake!
Cette malédiction ne va pas se dissiper toute seule.
TODO:There is knowledge to be found out there!
TODO:I can only sit idle for so long.
TODO:My mind is clear and prepared
TODO:I am a touch weary.
TODO:It gnaws at my thoughts, but I am capable.
TODO:Send me out if you must.
TODO:I could do with some time in the library.
TODO:Perhaps I could simply have some time to myself?
TODO:I have ingested some vile serums... I need rest.
TODO:It reaches into me! Please, not again!
TODO:It reaches into me! Please, not again!
TODO:It will not be silenced, please, show mercy!
TODO:It will not be silenced, please, show mercy!
Je suis fatiguée... Tellement fatiguée...
Je suis fatiguée... Tellement fatiguée...
TODO:Get away. I cannot stay awake any longer...
TODO:Get away. I cannot stay awake any longer...
TODO:I will not be able to resist its grasp!
TODO:I will not be able to resist its grasp!
TODO:Janet... If I could only feel your gentle touch...
Ne peut pas aller au bar

TODO:Through eldritch premonition, I know what lies ahead.
TODO:"It" has murmured to me about our path.
TODO:I have foreseen vital information. It is horrific.
TODO:Perhaps I can enlighten your pitiable minds.
TODO:I will share half-truths. You are not ready to know them in full.
TODO:Allow me to be your interpreter for the abyssal beings.
Cessez vos gémissements, il s'agit d'une blessure mineure.
Cela va piquer. Ne bougez pas.
La chair humaine est si simple...
TODO:It is all so predictable when I can concentrate.
TODO:I shall chart our path. You would be spotted instantly.
TODO:A task so routine by this point.
TODO:Its location was easy to deduce.
TODO:Was I truly the only one to spot it?
TODO:Did no one else think to look *under* the corpse?
Un choix admirable, mais absurde.
TODO:Move, you damned buffoons!
TODO:A burrowing snake? How?!
TODO:It will strike from below!
Espèce de crétin ! Tu vas me percer les tympans !
La chair se recompose... ?
Je suis en pleine forme.
Je me sens capable de résister à tout.
Une douleur si séduisante...
Si malsain... si réjouissant.
On ne me refusera pas ce bonheur pourpre.
Mon esprit domine TOUT !
La raison triomphera !
Une simple étudiante ? Plus maintenant.
Souillée de partout...
Souillée de partout...
Il me dévorera... à la fin.
Il me dévorera... à la fin.
Il s'agissait d'une grave erreur.
Il s'agissait d'une grave erreur.
Elle m'aime toujours, n'est-ce pas ?
On dirait bien que vous êtes... convenables.
Permettez-moi de vous soulager de ces pensées pesantes.
Vous... "m'impressionnez", pour ainsi dire.
Vous êtes tous autant détestables les uns que les autres.
Mes talents ne sont pas à la hauteur de ces crétins...
Misérables et miséreux, fiers comme des poux.
